1.name: RFID Security Gates
1.description: Advanced RFID-enabled security gates for library entrances. Features automatic detection, alarm system, and integration with library management systems. Built with durable materials and designed for high-traffic areas.
1.fullDescription: Our RFID Security Gates represent the pinnacle of library security technology. These gates utilize advanced RFID detection systems to ensure that all materials leaving the library are properly checked out. The gates feature a sleek, modern design that complements any library environment while providing robust security features. With a 99.9% detection rate, these gates virtually eliminate unauthorized removal of library materials. The system includes LED indicators for visual feedback, silent alarm capabilities for discrete security alerts, and full integration with existing library management systems. Installation is straightforward, and the gates can be configured for various entrance widths.
1.technicalSpecs: ISO 15693 compliant, supports multiple tag formats, includes professional installation and 2-year warranty

reviews.author: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Excellent security gates! Easy to install and very reliable. Our library has seen zero security incidents since installation.

reviews.author: Michael Chen
reviews.comment: Outstanding build quality and performance. The silent alarm feature is perfect for our quiet library environment.

2.name: RFID Tags & Labels
2.description: High-quality RFID tags and labels for books, media, and library materials. Durable, tamper-evident, and compatible with all major library systems.
2.fullDescription: Our RFID Tags & Labels are designed specifically for library environments, offering exceptional durability and performance. Each tag is manufactured to the highest standards using premium materials that ensure long-term reliability. The tags feature tamper-evident properties that make unauthorized removal virtually impossible without damaging the material. Compatible with all major library management systems, these tags support seamless integration into existing workflows. The adhesive is designed to bond permanently with various surface types including paper, plastic, and multimedia cases.
2.technicalSpecs: Self-adhesive, waterproof, temperature resistant (-40°C to +85°C), available in rolls of 500 or 1000 pieces

reviews.author: Linda Martinez
reviews.comment: These tags are fantastic! Very easy to apply and they stay put. We've tagged over 10,000 books with no issues.

3.name: SelfCheck 3000
3.description: Intuitive self-service terminal for libraries. High performance, energy efficiency, and flexible use in both desktop and floor-standing configurations.
3.fullDescription: The SelfCheck 3000 is a modern self-service terminal designed for efficient and user-friendly operation in library environments. It supports RFID and barcode technologies, can read up to 5 books simultaneously, and ensures safe and convenient service for patrons. Its versatile design allows for use in both desktop and floor-mounted configurations. With quickConnect™ software and SIP2 protocol support, it integrates easily with existing systems. Optional UNIFI+ and OPEN+ SUITE modules extend its capabilities by promoting library events and enabling access outside regular hours.
3.technicalSpecs: Compliant with ISO 15693 and ISO 18000-3 A/B, includes quickConnect™ software (license required), identification via RFID, barcode, smartcard, or manual entry

4.name: RFID Workstation (shielded EU)
4.description: Universal shielded workstation for fast and efficient library staff operations: tagging, inventory, and RFID tag processing.
4.fullDescription: Universal workstation for fast and efficient work of library staff in user service areas, cataloging, and book repositories. The station is a kit consisting of a radio frequency identification reader with an external shielded antenna. The station is used for tagging collections, circulation accounting, book issuance, and recording/processing RFID tags and electronic library cards operating at 13.56 MHz.
4.technicalSpecs: Product ID TAG000112-000. Includes staffConnect™ circ software. Shielded workstation for tagging, inventory, and library collection management.

5.name: DLA inventory Wand
5.description: Mobile station equipped with a large RFID antenna and tablet, providing excellent performance in detecting library materials, simplifying inventory and search operations for library staff.
5.fullDescription: The DLA inventory Wand mobile station is equipped with a large RFID antenna and tablet, providing excellent performance in detecting library materials. The device simplifies inventory and search operations for library staff. High performance allows reading up to 20 books per second, and two operating modes (standard and accelerated) provide flexibility. Long battery life and wireless connectivity make the device ideal for working in any library areas.

specifications.RF Power: Standard mode 1.5 W, Accelerated mode 4 W
specifications.Compatibility: ISO 15693, ISO 18000-3-A, (Infineon my-d, NXP I-Code, SLI, SLIx, SLIx2)
specifications.Power Supply: Rechargeable battery. Standard mode: 16 hours, Accelerated mode: 8 hours
specifications.Connectivity: WLAN / Wi-Fi (Wi-Fi Security Protocols WEP / WPA / WPA2)

5.technicalSpecs: Product ID HND000020-000. Includes staffConnect™ inventory software (license required). Mobile station for inventory and search of library materials.

6.name: Evolis Agilia Duplex Card Printer
6.tags: card printer, retransfer, card printing, library
6.description: Agilia retransfer card printer: highest print quality and optimal security for all your cards. 100% made by Evolis.
6.fullDescription: The Evolis Agilia Duplex retransfer card printer delivers exceptional print quality with 600 dpi resolution and over-the-edge printing capabilities. Supports single-sided or dual-sided card personalization. Highest level of security and durability thanks to multiple encoding options, microtext, guilloche patterns, and high-definition QR codes. Extensive card management capabilities include support for multiple card types, 200-card feeder, and printing speeds up to 150 cards/hour. Compact design weighing less than 10kg. Delivered with cardPresso XXS software for designing and editing badges.

specifications.Print Technology: Retransfer printing with direct-to-card dye-sublimation and Resin thermal transfer
specifications.Printing: Single-sided or dual-sided, over the edge printing
specifications.Display: Ergonomic LCD color touchscreen with QR codes display

features: High security level (microtext, guilloche, QR code)
6.technicalSpecs: Retransfer printing with 600x600 dpi resolution. Supports magnetic, contact and contactless encoding. 3-year printer warranty, lifelong print head warranty. Includes cardPresso XXS software.

7.name: 55" Vertical Touch Info Kiosk
7.description: Touch info kiosks are multipurpose equipment that can be easily integrated into virtually any space.
7.fullDescription: The 55-inch vertical touch info kiosk is multipurpose equipment that can be easily integrated into virtually any library space. Equipped with anti-vandal glass and infrared sensor technology supporting up to 10 simultaneous touches. High Full HD resolution 1920x1080 and brightness of 450 cd/m² provide clear and bright images. Built-in Intel Core i3 processor, 4 GB RAM and 128 GB SSD ensure smooth operation of interactive applications. Wi-Fi and wired connection support via Gigabit Ethernet provides reliable connectivity. Compact dimensions of 1850 x 730 x 60 mm allow the kiosk to be installed in various library areas.

specifications.Interfaces: DC Input, HDMI Output, VGA Output, 2xUSB 2.0, 2xUSB 3.0, RJ45(LAN), 1x3.5mm audio

7.technicalSpecs: 55" Full HD infrared touchscreen with anti-vandal glass. Intel Core i3, 4GB RAM, 128GB SSD, Windows 10. Wi-Fi and Gigabit Ethernet support. Multipurpose equipment for libraries.

8.name: 43" Horizontal Touch Info Kiosk
8.description: Touch info kiosks are multipurpose equipment that can be easily integrated into virtually any space.
8.fullDescription: The 43-inch horizontal touch info kiosk is multipurpose equipment that can be easily integrated into virtually any library space. The horizontal screen placement is ideal for placement on desks, information counters, and work areas. High Full HD resolution provides clear images. Built-in Intel Core i3 processor, 4 GB DDR3 RAM and 128 GB storage ensure smooth operation of interactive applications. Windows 10 operating system provides compatibility with a wide range of applications. Compact dimensions of 1025 x 749 x 444 mm allow the kiosk to be installed in various library areas.
8.technicalSpecs: 43" Full HD touchscreen in horizontal orientation. Intel Core i3, 4GB DDR3 RAM, 128GB, Windows 10. Compact multipurpose solution for libraries.
